rukus.text: Esho nishio eshitabu shibulamwo obukanakani nishiobulunjifu khubalia abaria Nyasaye
Balia abasuubilanga mubilalolekha, abaswaliyanga (iswala) khatsotso, ne barusinjia eshihanwa khumukabo kwa khubakabile
Balia basuubilanga khu kalia keshibwa khwiwe, nende kalia keshibwa imbeli wuwo, ne basuubilanga muno inyanga yeyindukho
Abo bali khubulunjifu okhurula khu Nyasaye wabu, ne abo nibobalibura
Toto balia abakhaya ni halalasa awo, obekanyilisie nohomba oleshe okhubekanyilisia shibalisuubila tawe
Nyasaye yara eshifunikho khumioyo chiabu nende khutsimbulililo tsiabu nende khutsindolelo tsiabu, mana bali nende eshinyasio eshilulu
